death.attack.acid_venom: %1$s was disintegrated from the inside out
death.attack.acid_venom.player: %1$s was disintegrated from the inside out while fighting %2$s
death.attack.brimstone_flames.player: %1$s was engulfed in brimstone flames trying to escape from %2$s
death.attack.hellfire.player: %1$s got turned into ashes while fighting %2$s
death.attack.hex_flames.player: %1$s had their existence get burned while fighting %2$s
effect.lethality.bmmode.description: Does nothing, it's just a cooldown.
effect.lethality.brimstone_flames_buff.d: Quickly deals damage over time but greatly increases your damage and grants lifesteal.
effect.lethality.crumbling.description: Multiplies your damage reduction by 0.7x and reduces your defense by 10.
effect.lethality.hellfire.description: Halts your regeneration and deals damage over time.
effect.lethality.hfmmode.description: Does nothing, it's just a cooldown.
effect.lethality.iron_will.description: Half of the damage you deal hits again after a short delay.
effect.lethality.rage.description: Makes all hits deal more damage and ignore enemies i-frames
effect.lethality.stained_calamity.descri: Your mental fortitude is fading away.
effect.lethality.tranquility.description: Makes nearby mobs unable to target you.
tooltip.lethality.alfajor_de_maicena.adv: §e -Heals a small amount of your life
tooltip.lethality.battle_maid_set.advanc: §e -Enter into a Battle Maid Power state, doubling your Cuteness level
tooltip.lethality.bladecrest_oathsword.a: §e -Shoots a homing scythe that burns enemies.§e
tooltip.lethality.blighted_cleaver.advan: §e -Shoots a piercing slash that builds 1 stack of §aAcid Venom §eand §4Hellfire §ethat lasts for 2 seconds.§e
§e -Builds 1 stack of §aAcid Venom §eand §4Hellfire §ethat lasts for 4 seconds.§e
tooltip.lethality.blighted_cleaver.toolt: §8« Still poisonous and forgotten, but now it's evil. »
tooltip.lethality.bm_chestplate.tooltip: §8It's actually stronger than kevlar, for some reason
tooltip.lethality.broken_biome_blade.adv: §aPure Clarity §e— Inflicts §fCrumbling §eand shoots a projection of the blade.§e
§5Decay's Retort §e— Grants a small amount of §clifesteal§e.§e
tooltip.lethality.defiled_greatsword.adv: §e -Shoots three piercing slashes that builds 1 stack of §aAcid Venom §eand §4Hellfire §ethat lasts for 5 seconds.§e
§e -Builds 1 stack of §aAcid Venom §eand §4Hellfire §ethat lasts for 10 seconds.§e
tooltip.lethality.defiled_greatsword.too: §8« It's still poisonous and forgotten, but now it's ultimately evil. »
tooltip.lethality.devils_devastation.adv: §e -Shoots three piercing scythes and two pitchforks that burns and inflicts Shadowflame.§e
tooltip.lethality.exalted_oathblade.adva: §e -Shoots three piercing scythes that burns and inflicts Shadowflame.§e
tooltip.lethality.forbidden_oathblade.ad: §e -Shoots a scythe that burns and inflicts Shadowflame.§e
tooltip.lethality.foreign_hook.advanced4: §e -Throw the hook, impaling and dragging your enemy towards you§e.
tooltip.lethality.gaels_greatsword.advan: §e -Shoots homing skulls that explode on contact with enemies.§e
tooltip.lethality.gaels_greatsword.toolt: §8« Hand it over. That thing, your Dark Soul. »
tooltip.lethality.gamblers_blade.advance: §e -Deals §f25%§e extra damage for each gambling-related accessory.
§e -Triggering a §fJackpot §econsumes a random number of §cBlood Coins §ebetween §f1 §eand §f7§e.
tooltip.lethality.gamblers_blade.tooltip: §8« Maybe you should touch the blade. »
tooltip.lethality.grievance.advanced2: §e -Engulfs the user in Brimstone Flames, constantly damaging them in exchange for an immense damage boost and lifesteal.§e
tooltip.lethality.grievance.tooltip:
§4Stage IV, Acceptance
§8« End of reasoning
Carnage and pain
A feral sense of dominance
As all the blood melts into the rain
A clash of history
In blood, sweat and tears
This war will cause our world to change
And will be remembered through the years... »
tooltip.lethality.hf_bm_chestplate.toolt: §8You could probably tank an entire KI blast with this
tooltip.lethality.hf_meowrasama.advanced: §e -Massively increases your attack and movement speed, also slows nearby enemies§e.
tooltip.lethality.hf_meowrasama.tooltip: §8« I said my sword was a tool of justice. Not used in anger. Not used for revenge. But now, I'm not so sure. And besides... Oh, the kitty purrs. »
tooltip.lethality.midas_touch.advanced3: §e -If using §6Fateful Coin§e, §fCoin Crit §eis guaranteed and its damage is doubled.
tooltip.lethality.midas_touch.tooltip: §8« Don't even think about touching the blade. »
tooltip.lethality.nightfall.advanced2: §e -Deals 5% of the enemy's max health as §5magic damage§e.
tooltip.lethality.nightfall.advanced4: §e -Shield yourself by 30% of your max health.
tooltip.lethality.nightfall.advanced6: §e -Consume the remaining shield and heal by a portion of it.
tooltip.lethality.nightfall.tooltip: §8« I alone am the bastion between eternal existence and oblivion. »
tooltip.lethality.nightmare_sword.advanc: §e -Hits three times, throws hit enemies into the air and makes them §eVulnerable
tooltip.lethality.pickle_paddle.advanced: §e -Quickly shoots bouncy pickle balls, gaining more damage with each bounce.§e
§e -You can be hit by your own bouncing pickle balls.§e
tooltip.lethality.real_knife.advanced4: §e -When your §cGenocidal Bar §eis full, consumes the charges and grants §cMegalomaniac§e.§e
tooltip.lethality.sacrifice.tooltip:
§4Stage II, Lament
§8« You have known for certain
Your path is one of justice
All those who try to obstruct shall have paid the ultimate price
Yet, upon inspection
Your foe is overwhelming
But you remember what she tried to sacrifice... »
tooltip.lethality.starlight.advanced2: §e -Attacks with a barrage of extremely fast armor-piercing stabs.§e
tooltip.lethality.stop_sign.alt_tooltip_: §4REALITY COMPROMISED, THE CLOWN HAS BEEN ENGAGED.
tooltip.lethality.stop_sign.tooltip: §4REALITY COMPROMISED, THE CLOWN HAS BEEN ENGAGED.
tooltip.lethality.vehemence.advanced2: §e -Fires out hellish bolts that explode on contact with enemies.§e
tooltip.lethality.vehemence.tooltip:
§4Stage III, Epiphany
§8« The end has come;
The witch and the prophecy
Deciding fates with the world on the line
Who shall emerge
From the ashes of calamity?
How shall this fable end through these legends intertwined...? »
tooltip.lethality.violence.advanced2: §e -Hits two times and builds 5 §cFlames Hex §estacks that lasts for 5 seconds.§e
tooltip.lethality.violence.tooltip:
§4Stage I, Grief.
§8« No more holding back
They'll wish for demise
They thought they were invincible
But you could see through their hollow lies
You've seen how far they've come
How many they've slain
You will gladly tear their limbs apart
All before they start to kill again... »
